attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To create a debate on this very complicated topic of fathers rights over if a termination should be allowed of their baby.
This should look at if men will be responsible enough to look after the child, the family support in looking after that child, financial payments for losses in income for the mother,failure for the father to take care of the baby after its birth and most importantly to look into the long standing misunderstanding that fathers have no feelings towards their unborn child.
Although a complicated topic, this  is something that has been overlooked for too long.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/unbornfathers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
